website_summaries.verdict: The Surface 3 offers a welcome price break from the pricey Microsoft Surface Pro 3, and it's well built, offers a full version of Windows, and boasts impressive battery life. But in a crowded field, a solid tablet that relies heavily on expensive accessories falls short of top marks.
pros: Full HD display with touch and pen support
New Intel Atom x7 processor offers better performance than other Atom-based competitors
Long battery life in our tests
Includes a full version of Windows 8.1, with free year of Office and OneDrive
cons: Type Cover and Surface Pen sold separately
Atom processor can't compete with Intel Core CPUs
Power connector is loose and bulky

customer_reviews.title: A CHANGE OF BRAND
customer_reviews.text: This tablet has replaced an old "generic" brand one. I m amazed with the increased functionality of this new machine and will never be going back to the previous big brand! The tablet also works great as a portable laptop and runs all the programs i have loaded onto it perfectley. I would recomend purchasing a bluetooth mouse in addition.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Zdravkovic

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant, brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant, brilliant, brilliant the best tablet I've had (previously owned an iPad and a Nokia Lumia tab) the bundle is great value (black Friday purchase) all delivered well packaged, all components in original Microsoft sealed packing.
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: the best laptop/tablet crossover...if you can get a good price
customer_reviews.text: if you can pick the surface up at a good price its the best crossover laptop/tablet out there hands down, feels and looks quality and they keyboard cover is superb, ive sampled a few alterntives like HP x-series/210 and yoga and a few others but this is the best
customer_reviews.author: Planty's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Lightweight
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Lightweight, powerful and flexible. I use it for social browsing and also for work when I am away from my office. My one issue was that the power cable was missing, which then gave me concern that the product itself was recycled; but this was not the case and Amazon quickly sorted the power cable issue.
customer_reviews.author: BM

customer_reviews.title: Similar problems to the Surface 4 (which doesn't fill me ...
customer_reviews.text: Similar problems to the Surface 4 (which doesn't fill me with hope for the future). Keeps freezing, won't switch on at times and graphics driver kept stopping. Installing the windows 10 update solved the graphics driver problem but others persist.
customer_reviews.author: David Knight

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: This came in real quick time. It was a used unit but when I looked at it, I could not tell it was used. The only downside is that it's missing the surface pen. I'm hoping this will come in the next few days.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cunliffe

customer_reviews.title: Good price for a refurbished product
customer_reviews.text: Good price for a refurbished product. Works well for standard use in office, and media streaming. Bought mine for £417 and included keyboard and pen.
customer_reviews.author: Panda

customer_reviews.title: Low rate as you have to buy office which was ...
customer_reviews.text: Low rate as you have to buy office which was all included on my surface 2. So upgrading to a surface 3 you would think all apps would be included.....so a big downfall
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a present for my daughter , she thinks it's amazing
customer_reviews.author: Rkk

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Surpassed expectations
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Surpassed expectations. Well built, good quality, light weight for carrying around, easy to use, compact but standard size keys on keyboard.
customer_reviews.author: David Moore

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this laptop. I wanted small, light, not to expensive and [powerful. Great job
customer_reviews.author: A. Hamill

customer_reviews.title: Got the tablet but not the rest of the bundle
customer_reviews.text: The tablet is fine and very high quality. The problem with me is i actually didn't get the bundle. After ordering it i only got the tablet and the rest of the bundle was left out. Amazon was quick in offering me a 20% refund (after negotitiations with them) but i hoped to not have to do that in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: kuwari316

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant item, would rate it higher in terms of value for money and portability than the Surface Pro
customer_reviews.author: MIllan Rajasooriar

customer_reviews.title: 365 is Not free
customer_reviews.text: The unit is excellent. However a note to all out there. You do not get the 1 year 365 office with the product. I am still running around after Amazon and Microsoft and getting no where ;0(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great laptop small and light
customer_reviews.text: great laptop small and light, with amazing operating system. I love it it's better then the surface 4 for as the 4 to big to carry
customer_reviews.author: Jeanie-poos

customer_reviews.title: One item but 2 uses
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with my surface,saves carrying a laptop and a tablet around for business as I work away.
customer_reviews.author: MRS DEBRA MICHELLE KELLY

customer_reviews.title: One of the best products for a student to get
customer_reviews.text: One of the best products for a student to get. Makes note taking a fun experience. The only problems i can think of are: 1. Screeching sound from both speakers and headphones, probably a software problem while listening to some videos. 2. The document scanning function in windows 8.0 is not found on windows 10 for some reason. Otherwise awesome product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never buying from Amazon warehouse again.
customer_reviews.text: The product itself is fine, if a little overpriced for the power it offers. However. The 'reconditioned' product worked only once correctly then would get stuck in start up mode requiring factory resets each time, don't touch products from Amazon warehouse as they can't offer replacements either
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A very nice little PC/tablet
customer_reviews.text: Pretty fast and pretty powerful for everyday use on both mains or battery. The very easily attached/removed keyboard is cleverly designed and works extremely well, as does the pen. Have seen no lagging when browsing the internet or watching a HD movie, or using the Office applications. It is a pity that there is no external indicator to show when charging is complete - although the power cord has an LED indicating that it is 'live' and is charging, the only way to tell charging has completed s by booting up the computer and looking at the battery indicator on the task bar.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not sold as advertised and Amazon not willing to sort
customer_reviews.text: This item is not as described, said it had a 1-year subscription to Office 365 Personal included but this is not the case. There is nothing in the paperwork, I spoke to Amazon and they said I would need to contact Microsoft who said no it was Amazon as they sold it to me. Amazon said they would give me a refund but as this was a present and is now overseas this was not possible. They said they couldn't help.
customer_reviews.author: skins

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed not to receive the whole Bundle
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed not to receive the whole Bundle, Pen and Keyboard missing! now have the hassle of trying to get these items!
customer_reviews.author: Richard Tucker

customer_reviews.title: Don't Buy This
customer_reviews.text: Bought a Microsoft surface after 13 months the on of switch broke off could not turn it on spoke to Microsoft most unhelpful company I have ever experienced. They refused to fix it said they do not fix the surface they only replace them. I could get a new one for 220 pounds what a rip off you should at least be able to turn a machine off and on and be able to get this fixed after 13 months. Buy this at your peril. One further thing they will not allow you to speak to a supervisor so you cannot escalate your complaint. Goods not of merchandisable quality.
customer_reviews.author: kenneth
